model.fsm

Class State<G extends Game>

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.fsm.State<G>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - the game of which this is a state.

    public abstract class State<G extends Game>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an abstraction of the different states of a game.
    Author:
    Celia Cacciatore - Raphael Bauduin
